data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended On March 31 2025
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated May 19 2025 and pursuant to Regulation 30 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we enclose herewith the Audited Integrated Financial Results for the quarter and Year ended on March 31 2025 along with Independent Auditors Limited Review Report submitted by Statutory Auditors of the Company.

The above financial results were approved by the Board of Directors (the Board) of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. on May 22 2025. The meeting of the Board commenced at 03:30 P.M. and concluded at 06:40 P.M

data.caption: Results - Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2023
data.news_body:
Further, to our letter dated July 20, 2023 and pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we attached herewith the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended June 30, 2023 alongwith Independent Auditors' Limited Review Report submitted by Statutory Auditors of the Company.

The above financial results were approved by the Board of Directors (the 'Board') of the Company at its meeting held on July 28, 2023. The meeting of the Board commenced at 4:30 p.m. and concluded at 7:20 p.m.

The meeting of the Board commenced at 5:00 p.m. and concluded at 7:45 p.m.

data.caption: Half - Yearly Disclosure On Related Party Transactions September 2022
data.news_body: Further to our letter dated November 3, 2022, we attach herewith details of Related Party Transactions, in accordance with the applicable accounting standards for the half-year ended September 30, 2022 in terms of Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 as Annexure A.The details have also been submitted as part of the financial results of the Company for the quarter and                          half-year ended September 30, 2022.

data.caption: Results-Financial Results For The Quarter And Half-Year Ended September 30, 2022
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated October 26, 2022 and pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we attach herewith the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter and half-year ended September 30, 2022 alongwith Limited Review Report submitted by Statutory Auditors of the Company.

The above financial results were approved by the Board of Directors (the 'Board') of the Company at its meeting held on November 3, 2022. The meeting of the Board commenced at 3:20 p.m. and concluded at 6:05 p.m.
